task.prompt:
Let $\mathbf{A} =\begin{pmatrix}  -1 & 2 \\  3 & 4  \end{pmatrix}.$  Then there exist scalars $p$ and $q$ such that
\[\mathbf{A}^6 = p \mathbf{A} + q \mathbf{I}.\]Enter the ordered pair $(p,q).$
